name: Gamers' Delight
overview: Gamers' Delight is a compilation of 41 games for Amigas with CD-ROM, CD32 and CDTV. All games were developed by Harald Müller. The CD contains: Alien Hunter AmiMind Bomber 2000 Filou Flotte Fireball Flotte Galaga 94 Go Kevin Go Happy Monster JumpMan Labyrinth Logik Marble Mau Mau Missile Mover Moving Multi Zocker Paint It Patience Patience II Patience III Piece in Space Pipe Master 2 Rescue Rescue 2 Reverse Rollerball Rolling Stones Roundabout Senso Skat Snake Soko Space Bomber 2 Space Dunk Spacer Speed Worms Stones Walls
